item.title: Nebius Retail Traders Brace For Q3 Report After Stock's 300% Rally This Year – Retail Cautious After CoreWeave Warning
item.description: Nebius retail following showed optimism interlaced with caution ahead of the quarterly report due Tuesday, just before the market opening.

item.title: Apple Removes Top Gay Dating Apps In China After Government Order
item.description: The popular gay dating app Grindr was banned in the country in 2022.

item.title: SoftBank’s Masayoshi Son Exits Nvidia, After OpenAI Bet Powers Q2 Outperformance
item.description: Despite SoftBank’s Masayoshi Son envisaging a deeper plunge into AI, his firm exited its Nvidia position at the end of the September quarter.
